message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to give away all the money.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about we split it down the middle?
Not bad, but I'm not willing to give up 2/3 of the money. I'll make a counteroffer.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to prioritize my own gain. This is my best offer so far.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I think I can still get a better deal. Let's try to meet in the middle again.
